TEXT.TITLE: GTE <GTE> UNIT TO SELL INFORTEXT PRODUCTS
TEXT.BODY: Infortext Systems Inc said it finalized a two-year agreement under which GTE Services Corp and eight affiliates will sell Infortext's line of personal computer-based telephone call accounting systems. GTE Services, a unit of GTE Corp, evaluated 23 competitive call accounting systems, the company said. Reuter
